CustomField.description: Based on the 'Review Star Rating' - 5 Stars = 5 points, 4 Stars = 2 points, 3 Stars = 0 points, 2 Stars = -2 points and 1 Star = -5 points.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Based on the 'Review Star Rating' - 5 Stars = 5 points, 4 Stars = 2 points, 3 Stars = 0 points, 2 Stars = -2 points and 1 Star = -5 points.
CustomField.label: Customer Review Operative Score
